title: (2430) Marinha Grande - 29 Rua Vieira de Leiria
title_short: (2430) Marinha Grande - 29 Rua Vieira de Leiria
description: Free parking lot in the city center. Close to Glass museums, library, glassblowing workshops, cinema, local church, bars and restaurants. Small grocery stores and 3 minute walk to a big Intermarche store.

title: (2430-241) Marinha Grande - 2 Rua Bernardino José Gomes
title_short: (2430-241) Marinha Grande - 2 Rua Bernardino José Gomes
description: Quiet parking Next to Fire Station, Museum of Glass and Municipal Archive. Near Municipal Chamber. Without services. Intermarche at 900 meters. We have spent a quiet night

title: (2430-307) Marinha Grande - Lote 8, 2430-309 Rua das Portas Verdes
title_short: (2430-307) Marinha Grande - Lote 8, 2430-309 Rua das Portas Verdes
description: Launderette new and clean. Large parking lot in front of it.

title: (2430-275) Marinha Grande - 174 Avenida José Gregório
description: Intermarche. fresh water available. no grey/black dumping.

title: (2430) Marinha Grande - Rua da Portela
description: Parking in the middle of the pine forest. Many picnic tables and a water point. Very quiet and beautiful.

title: (2430-123) Marinha Grande - 66 Rua dos Poços
description: Herdade das Toupeiras offers this space where you can spend the night and day with your motorhome in total peace and rest. From here you can take the opportunity to get to know the city of Marinha Grande, which is the land of glass, as we are located less than 1 km from the city center. Namely, you can visit the Glass Museum and also the Joaquim Correia Museum, where you can also enjoy the beautiful gardens that exist in this city. Herdade das Toupeiras is also located about 10 km from the coast where we have several fantastic beaches to discover. At 100m from the Herdade there is a cafe and a laundry and we also have a bakery at about 300m and the supermarket is also close at about 700m. At Herdade das Toupeiras we have 12 places available, however the resources for motorhomes are still scarce and archaic, as the Herdade is not intended for profit. Soon it is expected to create an area for dumping and water supply. Donations are welcome for the proper maintenance and improvement of the space. As a campervan that I am, you can always count on me for anything! The Estate is open 24 hours but it is convenient to call to notify your arrival

title: (2430) Marinha Grande - 55 Rua de Francos
description: Parking of the Recreative club of the village. Parking is free and there is a public tap of water. If the club is open go for a coffee the community appreciates

title: (2400-801) Amor - 80 Rua da Fé
description: Picnic park very well equipped. Perfect to stop to eat and rest, or even sleep. There is no camping signage, but there is ample unrestricted parking. Quinchos with grills, covered oven, picnic tables, children's games, soccer field, exercise equipment, drinking water, bathrooms and showers. A beautiful and newly enabled place. Walking trails begin, a river passes and there is a swing. All very well taken care of. I was surprised to find it. Very long caravans will have to park a few meters further away, but they will still fit.

title: (2430) Marinha Grande - Unnamed Road
description: Many picnic areas hidden in the forest. For us, very quiet at this time, we even slept there. Beware, however, of certain paths where there is a lot of sand.

title: (2430) Marinha Grande - Unnamed Road
description: I've spent the night there and it was fantastic! You can sleep while hearing the water and nature. There are tables and trash bins all over. If you go there I suggest parking the car and going on foot near the road, because there are a lot of places to choose, then go get the car to your preferred spot.

title: (2445) Martingança - 18 Rua do Rossio
description: A good place to stop to eat or rest with coffee / pastry shop next door.

title: (2405-009) Maceira - 2A Travessa da Shell
description: Shaded spot appropriate for overnight stay. Auto electrician across the road who will bring cars in and out of a morning and afternoon. Car park empties in afternoon. Next door to Service station and farms. Road is quiet of a nighttime.

name: Camping Orbitur
title: (2430-492) Camping Orbitur
description: Camping Orbitur, nice, big enough, swimming pool with slide, restaurant, grocery store, and the fishmonger spends the morning. We can stay until 17h.

address.street: Marinha Grande - São Pedro de Moel

title: () Marinha Grande - Unnamed Road
description: Hard sand beach parking lot. Ocean view. Do not come in the middle of the day in high season because you run the risk of finding the parking lot full and the small access road can be difficult to pass with a motorhome if there are cars on the sides.

title: () Marinha Grande - Unnamed Road
description: Parking with sea view, nice restaurant on the first day of opening. Out of season it must be possible to sleep.

title: (2400) Leiria - 122 Rua Casal de Santa Clara
title_short: (2400) Leiria - 122 Rua Casal de Santa Clara
description: 2016.12.15 - parking cars along the street in a residential area surrounded by greenery on the hills of the city. A location would have been best at 100 meters roughly right in dead-end street, but I dared not disturb the car whose occupants seemed very busy in this somewhat dark area!

title: (2430) Marinha Grande - Praia da Vieira - São Pedro de Moel
title_short: (2430) Marinha Grande - Praia da Vieira - São Pedro de Moel
description: Stayed here for a couple of nights lovely beach but no facility

address.street: Praia da Vieira - São Pedro de Moel

title: (2430-492) Marinha Grande - 17 Praça Afonso Lopes Vieira
title_short: (2430-492) Marinha Grande - 17 Praça Afonso Lopes Vieira
description: Public tap on a small square above the beach. Good for filling bottles and cans, no possibility to connect a tap or hose. There is a public shower on the beach.

title: (2430-517) Marinha Grande - Rua Antigas Serrações
description: Parking by the beach quiet place, tiny and beautiful town, just 100m there are showers and bathrooms belonging to the beach (free that if the cold water), there is also a chiringito where we have breakfast super cheap, in summer season we assume that this full is another one a little higher on the right. It is already the second time we come to this town and I am sure we will return

name: Parque Campismo S. Pedro Moel, Grupo Campigir
title: (2430) Parque Campismo S. Pedro Moel, Grupo Campigir
title_short: (2430) Parque Campismo S. Pedro Moel, Grupo Campigir
description: Parque de Campismo Sao Pedro de Moel, large campsite, lots of space, beautiful surroundings. Very basic sanitary facilities in dire need of updating. Showers are outdated but hot. The dishwater is cold. Some of the campsite is already being modernized. There is now an area for gray water disposal and fresh water. The pitches are flat and on firm but sandy ground. There are also shaded pitches in some places. Seat selection is free. Electricity on the pitch is included (note: sockets only for type F plugs, adapter for CEE required!). Magnificent view of the sea across from the campsite, near a lighthouse with great cliffs (5min walk), nice bathing beach 15min walk away.

title: (2430-494) Marinha Grande - 15 Avenida José Nobre Marques
title_short: (2430-494) Marinha Grande - 15 Avenida José Nobre Marques
description: Parking with beach view. No facilities.

title: (2430-494) Marinha Grande - 8 Avenida José Nobre Marques
title_short: (2430-494) Marinha Grande - 8 Avenida José Nobre Marques
description: Above the sea, showers on the beach, indoor showers at the toilets which are under the promenade towards the center, closed at 6 p.m. we broke down for 3 days in this car park. showers on the beach, WC a little further.

title: (2415-408) Leiria - 2 Estrada da Estação
description: Illuminated and level parking lot directly at the train station. Suitable for mobile homes and vans up to around 6.50 m. Public toilets in the station open at the same time as the cafeteria. No trains at night. Garbage cans in the parking lot. Very quiet and safe area. Very tasty restaurants just around the corner (we went to Cervejaria João Gordo, great!).

title: (2430) Marinha Grande - Unnamed Road
description: Access is made from São Pedro beach (to avoid sandy road). This is a magical corner with ocean view to both south and north. Easy access to an almost private beach. The road is a bit sandy a bit rocky, but I think it’s accessible to almost any camper at the moment. Do not try to reach it from south because the road is more sandy. There’s a beach nearby called São Pedro with supermarkets and restaurants.

title: (2430) Marinha Grande -
description: Only for picnicking, do not sleep there even if there is no prohibition sign, the GNR passes regularly to take you out. The area was badly affected by the fire.

title: (2430) Marinha Grande -
description: Quiet place with a magnificent view of the beach and sea. Beach access very close by.

title: (2445) Pataias - 2445 Acesso Água de Madeiros
description: Parking in an unfinished subdivision, between village and beach. Possibility of day and night. Quiet without service.

title: (2400) Parceiros - 413 Rua de Santa Clara
description: A small LPG gas station where you can also feel empty German gas bottles. An adapter for German bottles is available. This can also be used to fill other bottles that you have connected to the German gas system with an adapter.

title: (2415-408) Leiria - 2 Rua B
description: Laundry self service station

title: () Leiria - Unnamed Road
description: The parking lot is flat, but there is a lot of noise at night due to traffic on the road next to it. There is a shopping mall across the street (Leiria shopping). No services

title: (2430) Marinha Grande - Unnamed Road

description: Nice park to visit city, it possible overnight, near castle and city center 10 min walking

title: (2445) Pataias - 18 Rua do Jogral

title: (2400-137) Leiria - Av. Bernardo Pimenta
description: Carpark across the road from the stadium, by the river. very quiet at night. cars start coming in around 8.30am during the week. close to loads of cafés across the river and short walk to restaurants. note that the carpark close to the stadium is used for a market (clothes, flowers, bags, etc..) on Tuesdays. recycling bins available

title: (2445) Pataias - 14 Rua do Segrel
description:
Awesome spot with straight sea views left and right. Also great surf.
Toilets locked at night when the bar closes. Access to the glorious beach via stairs. impressive lava formation nearby.

title: (2440) Golpilheira - 75 Rua de Leiria
description: Beautiful laundry room with a drinking water fountain ideal for refilling and drinking…

title: (2415-367) Leiria - 21 Rua Rossio dos Borges
description: Sandy parking near the river, a lot of foot traffic (therefore rather secure). Slightly sloping in some places. A few trees for shade. No problem even during the Feria.

title: (2400-137) Leiria - Unnamed road
description: Large parking lot for city visits, close to the center, free of charge

title: (2445) Pataias - 173 Avenida Raínha Santa Isabel
description: Clean self-service laundry with three washing machines (16kg / 13kg and 10kg) and two dryers. Very clean and wifi available for customers! Open from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m.

title: (2445) Pataias - Polvoeira

title: (2400-221) Leiria - 123 Rua Capitao Mouzinho de Albuquerque

description: Perfect parking to spend the night. We were feeling the other one that is close but there were people at 3:00. We came to this one that also has the shade of some magnificent branches. It has a walk next to the river and the city market.

title: (2445) Pataias - São Pedro de Moel - Pataias

title_short: (2440) Batalha - Rua Nossa Senhora do Caminho
description: This site is the waste and water service area only, not overnight parking. There’s a charge for fresh water. The overnight parking area with electricity is close by, 100 metres away. 200 metres from the monastery, restaurants and cafes.

title: (2440) Batalha - 2440 Rua do Parque Cónego Manuel Simões Inácio
title_short: (2440) Batalha - 2440 Rua do Parque Cónego Manuel Simões Inácio
description: Let's pass a quiet night. We were two non-local parked motorhomes. A GNR passou, I fell with two motorhomes in no trouble. Passaram some times to go round, allowing pernoita. You have free Wi-Fi access.

title: (2440) Batalha - 330 Avenida dos Descobrimentos

title: (2440-038) Batalha - 14 Rua António Cândido da Encarnação

title: (2440) Batalha - 32 Estrada do Casal Novo
description: Temporary parking area on a serviced open lane for future construction and sale of land. Slightly sloping terrain with hard parking spaces away from the city and close to some villas. the land overlooks the city at the top of the hill near a relay antenna. no service but enough for a good night's visit to the monastery the next day. no vehicle at night, only passage of a neighbor who was walking his dog. the lampposts that equip the area do not work unlike those of the nearby road.

title: (2430-696) Vieira de Leiria - 6 Avenida Marginal
description: Public toilets and showers, open in January during the day when we were there (but maybe also at night, to see). Clean toilets. Outside faucet quite high so possibility of filling a can. Sinks with mirrors. 2 functional, spacious, clean and individual showers (with lock), cold, but free, very practical extra. Thanks to the city!!

title: () - Avenida Marginal
description:
Praia da Vieira de Leiria: old camper area, large parking near the sea! (150 places). Picnic areas and big river. Very nice, very large beach for beautiful walks!
There are facilities to empty grey and black water. At the other side of the river there is a water tap.

title: (2430-696) Vieira de Leiria - 9 Avenida Marginal
description: Parking in front of the large motorhome parking on the other side of the water line. Stable ground 100 meters from the sea. Quiet

title: () Pataias -

title: (2425) - Estrada Florestal
description: Small way to take between Pedrogão and Vieira, at the sign "Bem Vindo a Vieira". Allows you to arrive at an underground parking at the foot of the dunes, with direct access to the beach! Places are very popular on weekends! Surroundings burned by fire. Very quiet, avoid for long vehicles. No services

title: (2445-280) Pataias -
description: Very quiet place on the top of the beach. Sandy but compact terrain if you are traveling slow you will have no problems keep it clean that is Wild l spot and must stay. Slept one night plus half a day without any disturbances. When there is too much wind it is better to avoid it

title: (2445) Pataias - Rua da Praia
description: Lovely spot, very sloping, quite a few spaces but can be leveled with rocks, perhaps not suitable for large motorhomes. Be respectful of fishermen

title: (2445) Pataias - 21 Rua Nossa Senhora da Vitória
title_short: (2445) Pataias - 21 Rua Nossa Senhora da Vitória
description: Fountain with water, it is not indicated that it is "non-potable"

title: (2420) Boa Vista - 42 Rua da Moinhaga
description: Picnic area with playground, BBQ and washing-up facilities on the edge of the village. We spent the night on a weekday and it was very quiet, would not attempt coming here at the weekend as it will be busy with locals and probably no parking available. Small gravel parking area behind the toilet building, enough room for two vans. Toilets were closed when we visited but perhaps would be open usually. The water is only accessible by foot.

title: () Coz - 8 Rua Santa Rita
description: Lovely tranquil place. Silent night. Attractive little village. Church bells strike every hour but quiet and low so we weren't disturbed. Highly recommended. Loved it.

title: (2450) Valado dos Frades -
description: Isolated in a pine forest, there is a small lake with tables, garbage cans and barbecue. The spot is located on the edge of a forest road with no traffic at night

title: (2420) Arrabal - 12 Rua do Pinhoeiro
description: Quinta do Pinhoeiro, 10 minutes from Fátima, 25 minutes from the beaches and 5 minutes from the city center of Leiria.

title: (2450) Valado dos Frades -
description: Nice place in the middle of the forest by a lake. Fire pits, picnic tables and trash cans available. Very idyllic! Please leave clean!

name: Camping Coimbrão
title: (2425) Camping Coimbrão
description: Camping Coimbrao. 35 pitches, swimming pool etc. Very calm not suitable if turbulent children. Arrivee until 23h(15.6.to 31.8.), departure before 12h

name: Quinta da Cavada
title: (2420-138) Quinta da Cavada
description:
Quinta da Cavada.
Somos uma família autocaravanista, amantes da natureza e dos animais, somos vegetarianos e gostamos de tudo o que é biológico e temos uma pequena horta.  Moramos numa aldeia, chamada Souto de Cima que fica nos arredores de Leiria, Portugal, onde temos a nossa casa e um pequeno santuário animal, com cabras, ovelhas, galinhas, patos, etc... também temos cães, Golden Retriever e Pastor Alemão e um gato.
Numa parte do nosso terreno, melhorámos para acolher autocaravanas, temos 4 lugares, onde podem estar á vontade, tem água potável, despejos e chuveiro de água fria. O terreno é todo vedado.
Pagamento livre, para manutenção e melhoramentos do espaço. 
Todos são bem vindos, inclusive animais, só pedimos para respeitarem o espaço, as pessoas e os animais que cá estão.
Temos a 650m minimercado, café e pastelaria.
Na Vila da Caranguejeira que fica a 2.4 kms temos restaurantes, Multibanco, Bancos, lavandaria, talhos, farmácia, cafés, mini mercados, etc...
Para visitar aqui perto temos o Cruzeiro e o Miradouro do Carril que se podem visitar numa pequena rota panoramica com vista para a Vila da Caranguejeira, temos o Vale do Lapedo, O Parque Natural da Barroca da Gafaria, etc...
Estamos a 9.7 kms do centro de Leiria, a 18 kms de Fátima, a 32 kms das praias, a 22 kms do Mosteiro da Batalha, etc...Quinta da Cavada. We are a motorhome family, nature and animal lovers, we are vegetarians and we like everything organic and we have a small vegetable garden. We live in a village called Souto de Cima which is on the outskirts of Leiria, Portugal, where we have our home and a small animal sanctuary, with goats, sheep, chickens, ducks, etc ... we also have dogs, Golden Retriever and German Shepherd it's a cat. In a part of our land, we improved to accommodate motorhomes, we have 4 places, where they can be at ease, have drinking water, dumps and cold shower. The land is all fenced. Free payment, for maintenance and space improvements. Everyone is welcome, including animals, we only ask to respect the space, the people and the animals that are here. We have a 650m mini-market, coffee and pastry. In Vila da Caranguejeira which is 2.4 km away we have restaurants, ATMs, banks, laundry, butchers, pharmacy, cafes, mini markets, etc ... To visit nearby we have the Cruzeiro and the Miradouro do Carril that can be visited on a small panoramic route overlooking the village of Caranguejeira, we have the Vale do Lapedo, the Natural Park of Barroca da Gafaria, etc ... We are 9.7 kms from the center of Leiria, 18 kms from Fátima, 32 kms from the beaches, 22 kms from Batalha Monastery, etc ...

name: Casa Féteira
title: (2480-113) Casa Féteira
description:
Welcome you to our olive oil farm!

You can park your camping-car/van in our olive groove everyday of the week.

You can also ask for a guided tour of our olive mill in Portuguese, English or French, and understand how we make one of the bests olive oils of this region. From Mondays to Saturdays, between 9am and 6pm. 

You may want to order our homemade Portuguese meal and/or breakfast . 

You'll find our olive oil and other olive oil products on our shop and you'll be able to take home a piece of our portuguese culture!

We will be very happy to have you!

title: (2450) Nazaré -
description: Pine forest. Road with sand but passable with van. We spent the night. Pleasant place, quiet and sheltered from the wind.

title: (2450) Nazaré - Unnamed Road
description: A good alternative to the parking space in the immediate vicinity. Here you are somewhat sheltered and set back from the road. Access goes through a small forest path, for motorhomes but no problem.

name: Olhai Nazaré Outdoor resort
title: () Olhai Nazaré Outdoor resort
description: Ohai Nazaré Outdoor Resort - N 242 - 2km away from Nazaré - Perfect Spot to relax a few days and enjoy the sea food of this beautiful region

title: (2450) Nazaré -
description: In the heart of the forest, in a quiet area, a small clearing allowing you to enjoy the shy October sun. sand track to access it. Only 4x4.

title: (2450) Nazaré - Unnamed Road
description: Nice flat place under the pines, close to a wind turbine. For a single car, van, or motorhome. It’s a good alternative to the place under the wind turbine, as this one has more privacy and more shadows. A bit of noise from the wind turbine but nothing too noisy. If this spot is taken you cam always go under the wind turbine just across the road.

title: (2450) Nazaré -
description: Many places all along the way at the foot of the wind turbines. Easy access path. Not bothered by the sound of wind turbines covered by the sound of the waves. Very good fallback solution when the spot above the ocean is saturated. Note some waste all the same. For a quiet night close to Nazaré, it does the job perfectly.

title: (2450) Nazaré -
description: Small pine forest away from the road or any urban area. It is accessed after about 300 meters of sand, 4x4 traction recommended. The area is very calm and quiet. Five minutes from Nazare

title: (2425) Praia de Pedrogao - 35D Rua Maré Viva
title_short: (2425) Praia de Pedrogao - 35D Rua Maré Viva
description: After the huge parking lot of the big roundabout, there is a kind of median with direct access to the sea. There is a beach bar and a small hidden car park facing the ocean. Some places at the end of the afternoon. Flawless beach with showers.

name: Parque de Campismo da Praia de Pedrogão
title: (2425) Parque de Campismo da Praia de Pedrogão
title_short: (2425) Parque de Campismo da Praia de Pedrogão
description: Campsite right on the beach with all necessary facilities. All a bit old, but clean and very friendly.

title: (2420-093) Caranguejeira - 78 Rua das Industrias
description: Excellent place with drinking water from a source that has existed for many years

title: (2425) Pedrogao - 34D Rua Maré Viva
description: Huge free parking. Direct access to the beach. Nights allowed. Without service.

title: (2480) Dinez - 47-51 Rua do Barreiro
description: I went there on the recommendation of another GPL gas station because I hadn't taken a tank adapter for my LPG tank bottle with me and I needed the right adapter for Portugal and Spain. All adapters were available there and even normal German gas bottles could be helped. In addition, the LPG price was also very cheap. So it was worth filling up there right away. Easy to reach from the IC-2, only the entrance to the gas station was a bit narrow. Turning with my 7.40 long camper was possible.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 26 Rua Serra dos Candeiros
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - 26 Rua Serra dos Candeiros
description: Acesso através de terra Batida mas transitável, ótima vista e muito sossegado, tem 6 mesas pic nic e 2 barbecues.Sem água nem Wc.

title: (2450) Nazaré - Atlântica
description: Beachside area surrounded by nature, views of the sea and the mountains. Sandy lane a bit dirty, but very quiet.

title: (2450) Nazaré -
description: Pitch in a pine forest at the edge of a small road. We cleaned up the place a bit when we arrived. The regulars of the Gironde beaches will not be too out of place? Ideal for the night.

title: (2460) Maiorga - Az. das Chãs
description:
Nice pic-nic area with barbecue, minimalist - no wc - no water--no electricity. Great sky view, no noise apart of the wind. 
 I live around, please leave the place as you would love to find it

title: (2480) Alqueidão da Serra - 297 Rua Porto de Mós
title_short: (2480) Alqueidão da Serra - 297 Rua Porto de Mós
description: Very nice water point with tap on the side of the road. good flow

title: (2425-623) Leiria - 93 Rua Luís Pereira da Costa
title_short: (2425-623) Leiria - 93 Rua Luís Pereira da Costa
description:
Laundry with parking.
wash and dry

title: (2480-303) Porto de Mós - Rua do Rio Alcaide
title_short: (2480-303) Porto de Mós - Rua do Rio Alcaide
description: Washing machines at the Intermarche parking lot

title: (2440-208) Reguengo do Fetal - 6a Travessa Nossa Senhora do Fetal
title_short: (2440-208) Reguengo do Fetal - 6a Travessa Nossa Senhora do Fetal
description: If the other sites, on the way to the climb, are taken, there is the cemetery car park, quiet, fairly flat. Please leave the site clean for locals and hedgehogs.

title: (2450-287) Nazaré - 15 Rua da Cooperativa
description: The Lidl car park has four large spaces reserved for motorhomes. You can make the purchase, rest and sleep if you want. No emptying or water filling services.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 210 Estrada Principal
description: Rest area, located on a mixed parking lot, with greenery, several picnic tables and even a barbecue. 2 km from Porto de Mòs. Facing a small country road, quite quiet. Possibility to spend the day or even the night there. No service. At the start of a beautiful hike (10 km).

title: (2450-287) Nazaré -
description: Washy Laundromat Inside Continente Modelo Nazaré, very new machines great wash!

title: (2450-287) Nazaré - 3 Rua Belém do Pará
description: Opposite the 4 places offered by Lidl, the Continente store did the same thing: 3 beautiful, brand new large places and a little quieter than the one opposite (you can still hear the road). No services but free and authorized in a city that does not want us, it's not bad! Magnificent view of the city from the watchtower and its pretty walk less than 20 minutes on foot (1.7 km)

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 3 Largo do Rossio
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - 3 Largo do Rossio
description:
Free public toilets and showers including changing table. Very clean. Open from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m. Bad parking. It is best to use the parking lot on the opposite side of the park.
Not open on WEEKENDS!

title: (2450) Nazaré - Unnamed Road
description: In the middle of the forest, sandy path so recommended to Vans with 4 wheel drive. Really quiet, calm, among the pines. Not suitable for motorhome.

title: (2450-284) Nazaré - Nº8 Rua Maria Carvalho
description: Possibility to use only the hot shower inside the pool. Hot shower. Pool access

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - LH Rua Francisco Serra Frazão
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - LH Rua Francisco Serra Frazão
description: Park next to Santa Casa da Misericórdia. Quieter than ASA, because ASA is next to the road. Parking and overnight stay allowed, except on fair days.

title: (2440) Reguengo do Fetal - R. do Malhadouro
title_short: (2440) Reguengo do Fetal - R. do Malhadouro
description: Similar to the spot just up the road but with full mobile coverage (3 bars of 4g). Space for 2 vans. 10 minute walk from the climbing. Nice views. Quiet, peaceful.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - Av. Dr. Licinio Moreira da Silva 2480
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - Av. Dr. Licinio Moreira da Silva 2480
description: Large pitches with water and possibility of draining gray and black water. Leisure park with picnic tables, miniature golf, ice rink and beautiful and spacious children's play areas. Next to a busy road during the day. There is clean spring water across the street. The facilities here are very good. With abuse, no electricity.

address.street: Av. Dr. Licinio Moreira da Silva 2480

title: (2450) Nazaré - Atlântica
description: Picnic area. No watertap anymore. This one is disconnected.

title: (2440-208) Reguengo do Fetal - 15 Estrada de Fátima
title_short: (2440-208) Reguengo do Fetal - 15 Estrada de Fátima
description: Super point of view at the exit of Fatima, behind a restaurant but not private, easy to maneuver (kind of roundabout) surely cool for a meal and a night

title: (2450) Nazaré - N242
description: We parked wonderfully during the day, otherwise it is very difficult. Walking distance to the beach and Sitio possible. We have a 6m camper truck here too.

title: (2450) Nazaré -
description: Access by a sand track only in 4x4 but the spot is worth the detour.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - Unnamed Road
description: Moinho da Cabeça da Vaca it's a magical place with a chilling sunset. It has picnic tables and it is a typical mill in the region where flour was once milled to make bread.

title: (2450-384) Valado dos Frades - 8 Rua Professor Arlindo Varela
title_short: (2450-384) Valado dos Frades - 8 Rua Professor Arlindo Varela
description: We stopped to prepare food before reaching Nazaré. It has tables and a point to wash old but comfortable to wash. There is also a bar, although the owner is a bit dry and / or rough. It is close to the highway exit so it takes you 100 meters to get to Nazaré

title: (2425) Praia Pedrógão - 66 Rua Coronel Sampaio Rio
title_short: (2425) Praia Pedrógão - 66 Rua Coronel Sampaio Rio
description: Parking near the beach, with toilets, terraces, restaurants and close to the center of Pedrógão Beach

title: (2440-208) - Rua do Malhadouro
description: Small quiet spot, clearing along the path (very infrequent) place for 2/3 cc or more or less flat vans 50m from the climbing walls. No service

title: (2450) Nazaré - Estr. Areeiro
description: Not nice but ok for one night. It is a large parking lot of an adventure park and therefore only possible to park here in winter. The place is relatively flat. There is no view, you can hear the sound of the sea. Water tap is located next to the driveway by the fence.

title: (2425) Coimbrão - 10 Largo de São Tiago
description: Drinking water point with good pressure

title: (2450) Nazaré - 2450 Rua Padre Acrisio
description: Great tarred parking lot for campers. The place is flat and relatively quiet at the end of August. The site is located next to the Norpark leisure and adventure pool and in front of the surfing center. Officially only has 5 designated spaces but here the entire space is mostly unoccupied.

title: (2450-170) Nazaré -
description: Lavandaria Self-Service H2O. You can wash and dry your clothes here.  Cash to coin change available. Free WiFi, but I didn’t try it. It is possible to park near the building as it is not so busy area.

title: (2450-065) Nazaré - 1 Rua Dom Fuas Roupinho
description: Parking gratuit proche du centre ville 5 min à pied.

title: (2450-065) Nazaré - 5 Rua Maritony
description: Place to stay overnight and park. Without services.

name: Camping Orbitur Valado
title: (2450) Camping Orbitur Valado
description: Camping Valado, Orbitur group, 2 km from the center of Nazaré, but with a bus that stops on demand in front of the campsite. Well equipped, under the pines, calm.

title: (2425) Bajouca - Unnamed Road
description: Very nice picnic park. There is room to stop the motorhome and spend the night.

title: (2450-359) Valado dos Frades - 268 Rua Professor Arlindo Varela
title_short: (2450-359) Valado dos Frades - 268 Rua Professor Arlindo Varela
description: Drinkable water just outside nazare looks like a new tap

title: (2450-065) Nazaré - 13 Rua dos Tanques
description: Inexpensive laundry. clean and with free wifi

title: (2450-065) Nazaré - 124 Rua 25 de Abril
description: A place where you can tap drinking water. Is at least not signposted that it is not drinkable.

title: (3105) Guia -
description: Nice secluded parking lot where mostly locals go to the beach or also collect white berries (crowberries). When we arrived there was no car at all and total silence. Great access to the sea just a few steps over the dune. Highly Recommended. Since the driveway is very sandy, we recommend small vehicles with all-wheel drive. However, not absolutely necessary.

title: (2495) Leiria - Unnamed Road
description: This is an amazing little picnic parc called “Parque de Merendas da "Fonte de Peixe" - Vale Maior”. We spent 2 nights in the middle of nature, yet with 2 water fountains (one with a thread for hose). A local guy came by and even opened the toilets for us, we are not sure if they are normally open. very quiet nights alone, just nature sounds. there are rubbish containers and when you drive here, there is an asphaltic road (from direction casal dos ferreiros). we came from a different road, but it was very doable with our van, still we recomment coming from the direction mentioned.

title: (2450-065) Nazaré - 18 Largo da Fonte Velha
description: Places for 3 or 4 vans on the edge of the street, no services except public toilets in the small square 2 minutes. Very quiet place to spend the night.

title: (2450-163) Nazaré - 159 Rua Adrião Batalha
description: Free parking spaces 3min from the beach. Sloping and fairly narrow passages.

title: (2450) Nazaré - Unnamed Road
description: Hidden gem with a nice view. Multiple other vans parked here. Space to see the sunset. Police drove by in the morning without contacting any of the vans. Toilets are closed at night but open in the morning around 9-10am

title: (2425) - Rua da Lagoa
description: Perfect place. Free, Flat, shadow, small lake, toilet, small ice cream/restaurant. Many RV parking places. Clean

title: (2450-082) Nazaré -
description: Nazaré Volunteer Fire Brigade car park. The fire department benefits from the fees. Payment to the guard at the entrance, overnight stays allowed, but right on the main road. About 5 minutes walk to the beach.

title: (2460) - IC2
description: Park for trucks, 24 hours dinner and serviço, with showers. in the gás station

title: (2450-162) Nazaré - 11 Rua Doutor Ruy Rosa
description: Lavabdaria da Praia Laundromat

title: (2440) Reguengo do Fetal -
description: Stabilized parking with view for 2 motorhomes. Wind turbines nearby.

title: (2450-060) Nazaré - 1 Largo da Fonte
description: Drinkable water

title: (2450-222) Nazaré - 12 Praça Doutor Manuel Arriaga
description: Public toilets just off the beach

title: (2450-264) Nazaré - 51 Rua Sub-Vila
description: Laundry service Rio de Longe

title: (2450) Nazaré - En 242
description: Parking just above the area now prohibited for motorhomes. 10 spaces accessible to the large motorhome (a bus next to us). Large Nazare beach and town center 10 mins walk. We spent the day there. I don't know if we spent the night there. It's by the road, it might be a bit noisy for the night.

title: (2425) Bajouca -
description: Service area without the need to deviate from the road. There is a gas station where you can fill up your water for free and right next to it is a restaurant with very clean toilets.

title: (2450-111) Nazaré - 34 Avenida Vieira Guimarães
description: Self-service laundry

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 226 N243
description: Location at the edge of the road ideal for two camper because if no cars on top beautiful view, however noisy in the morning with cars that roll at high speed but repairs very well for one night.

title: (2450-106) Nazaré - 100 Avenida Manuel Remígio
description: Small water point 50 cm from the ground next to the fish dryers, it is difficult to find water in the area!

title: (2450-172) Nazaré - Rua dos Galeões
description: Gravel parking near the beach and the center of Nazaré. flat and with lots of space. Very busy from midday. Calmer again in the evening after bathing time.

title: (2450) Nazaré - 9 En 242
description: Magnificent location facing the ocean. flat place. We entered through the port where we paid €170 for the right of access. This location is easily accessible for a large CC, plus the dirt road is hilly.

title: (2460-711) Alcobaça - 1 N8
description: Picnic area with shaded tables, fountain, public toilets.

title: (2460) Alcobaça - 29 Rua Mariana Coelho Bernardo
description: Boutique Cruz de Cristo, Camping-Gaz dealer who has stock of references 907 and 904 and small 400gr

title: (2460) Alcobaça - Rua Dom Afonso de Albuquerque
title_short: (2460) Alcobaça - Rua Dom Afonso de Albuquerque
description: Laundromat in the gallery of Intermarché

title: (2460) Alcobaça - 33 Rua Professor Engenheiro Joaquim Vieira Natividade
title_short: (2460) Alcobaça - 33 Rua Professor Engenheiro Joaquim Vieira Natividade
description: Motorhome area with services. Don't recommend filling up with drinking water as there is only one tap right over the black water disposal and probably being also used for rinsing cassettes. There are more water fountains in the area, but the taps have been removed.

address.street: 33 Rua Professor Engenheiro Joaquim Vieira Natividade

title: (2460) Alcobaça - 13 Rua Fortunato de Magalhães
description: Small square next to the medical center, with some shadows. quiet by day although cars can be heard at night. Monastery very close to visit. Possible for Camper van but not for AC.

title: () Alcobaça -
description: Laundromat 300m up towards the modern buildings. Choradqueira next door.

title: (2460) Alcobaça - 27 Rua Professor Engenheiro Joaquim Vieira Natividade
title_short: (2460) Alcobaça - 27 Rua Professor Engenheiro Joaquim Vieira Natividade
description: Free parking, both sides of the road

address.street: 27 Rua Professor Engenheiro Joaquim Vieira Natividade

title: (2420) Gracios - Rua da Carvalha
description: Troncão Park. A quiet park with restrooms open during the day. Not for weekends as locals use it extensively for BBQ getaways. Can be noisy. Weekdays would be better.

title: (2460) Alcobaça - Rua Doutor Eduíno Borges Garcia
title_short: (2460) Alcobaça - Rua Doutor Eduíno Borges Garcia
description: Parking next to the Alcobaça market, and very close to the historic center. It has no services. You can sleep well at night, there are shadows, and even some green space. The tourist post indicated that we could spend the night here. Saturday morning there is market next door, prepare to wake up at night while riding it ..

title: (2460) Alcobaça - 21 Rua de Leiria
description: Laundromat. Detergent included in the machines. Payment by coins . In the top

title: () Alcobaça - 21 Avenida dos Combatentes
description: Huge parking near the abbey, very steep, only to visit.

title: (2460) Alcobaça - Rua de Leiria
description: Long, flat and very quiet car park a bit far from the center of Alcobaça. Behind Répsol. Nice clear view. Another French motorhome was there. Avoid Monday mornings because of a market.

title: (2495-032) São Mamede - 2 Rua José dos Santos
title_short: (2495-032) São Mamede - 2 Rua José dos Santos
description: Maria Sabão - Lavandaria Self-Service Neat neat self-service laundry. 3 washing machines of which 2x 11kg and 1x 18kg and 2 large dryers.

title: (2450) Nazaré - Unnamed Road
description: Payment to pass the port, very close to the beach, no amenities, passable dirt road.

name: Campo de Futebol da Bezerra
title: (2480) Campo de Futebol da Bezerra
description: It is a place at the start of the Ecopista walk. There is a playground and a football field. It is outdated on the one hand, but the facilities for motorhomes seem very new. There are toilets but they are closed. There is also a place to bbq, but no idea if that can be used. Water works. Everything for free.

title: (2460) Alcobaça - 30 Rua Doutor Francisco Zagalo
description: Potable water

title: (2495-032) São Mamede - 1 Rua de São Martinho
title_short: (2495-032) São Mamede - 1 Rua de São Martinho
description: Quiet, peaceful Aire with full services. Overnight is welcome. Many thanks to the small community. The coffee, breakfast and freshly baked hot breads at "Padrio Heleno" were wonderful. The only place to eat in this small village is "Marmita Do Ze Grande-Fatima" which is an "eat all you want buffet"  (good selection of home-cooked foods at an amazing price). Excellent.

title: (2450) Casal Mota - 2 R. do Cossi
description: Water spring

title: (2495) - 15 Rua das Grutas da Moeda
description: Ample free parking in the Grutas da Moeda. There is a snack bar and restrooms. It is not allowed to stay overnight. Services: water, discharge and disposal of toilet.

title: (2480) Alcaria - 118 Rua Manuel João Luís Salgueiro Alcaria
title_short: (2480) Alcaria - 118 Rua Manuel João Luís Salgueiro Alcaria
description: Outdoor nature place with picnic area. We spent a very quiet day among the pines. Road nearby . A nice little place for a break.

address.street: 118 Rua Manuel João Luís Salgueiro Alcaria

title: (2495-407) Fátima - 142 Estrada de Leiria
description: LPG station

title: (2460) Alcobaça - Rua da Escola
description: Quiet picnic area Some tables available A small road in front but relatively quiet at this busy time (August) A few areas of shade, pleasant even in heavy heat (today 32 ° outside 26 ° ds the van)

title: (2460-479) Alcobaça - 92 N8-6
description: Possibility of filling UK propane canister they speak English and have a variety of connectors ( we were desperate). So relieved

title: () - 4
description: Mountain bike center with shower and toilet, very clean parking lot

name: Camping Silveira
title: (2460) Camping Silveira
description: It is a small rural campsite. Place under the pines, possible to have electricity, only one block of shower and WC and very clean. Welcomed by the owner who speaks French and who is really very nice.

title: (2480) Alvados -
description: Picnic park located next to the municipal road to Alvados. Equipped with WC and BBQ area. Everything very clean and taken care of. The bathrooms have electricity with a socket. There is also a small lagoon that is very low, perhaps due to the time of year. Close to hiking trails.

title: (2460-615) Moleanos - Estrada Nacional 1, km 95
description: Clearance area, open from Monday to Saturday, from 9:30 am to 7:30 pm. Along with a store of accessories, liquids, Repsol gas. Store closed for lunch 1pm to 2.30pm. You can use tables and benches for picnics.  It is located on ESTRADA NACIONAL 1 - Km 95 - MOLEANOS.  Be sure to visit the motorhome utilities store on site.

title: (2495) Fátima - 25 Rua João Paulo II
description: Large free parking with some trees. I do not think that spending the night is disturbing. Provide holds.

title: (3105) Vermoil - 7 Rua Vale do Fôjo
description: Parking without services, quiet, a stone's throw from the town

title: (3105) Guia - Rua Fonte do Cabecinho
description: New area in Guia. Parking possible. In Guia mister Neves de têdêcar speaks french and super.

title: (2495-401) Fátima - 50 Rua de São Vicente de Paulo
title_short: (2495-401) Fátima - 50 Rua de São Vicente de Paulo
description: Fatima Parking available for visits. It is true that the number of "camper" places is limited, but apart from "important events and busy days" it is tolerated to park in the "car" parking lot, obviously taking care not to get in the way. In May 2019 the barriers were therefore open and nothing to pay, we stayed one night. Thanks to Fatima for her welcome. SPECIFIC: There are 14 or 15 parking spaces around the site where there is really space, we were in parking lot number 6

address.street: 50 Rua de São Vicente de Paulo

title: (2495) Fátima - Rua da Charneca
description: In a small road on the outskirts of Fatima, it does not seem to be private (no signs) any time there is a property a little further but it seems that it is a secondary access (field). Possible to park on the side in the annex path where between the trees ... We will spend the night and tell you the result as soon as possible :) .. Very good night in peace, I advise for an evening

title: (2495-401) Fátima - 96 Avenida de Dom José Alves Correia da Silva
title_short: (2495-401) Fátima - 96 Avenida de Dom José Alves Correia da Silva
description: Very large free car park near the sanctuary. No delimited places but a lot of places in the shade, paying attention to the height of the branches. Much more accessible than car parks 2 to 7 which fill up quickly.

address.street: 96 Avenida de Dom José Alves Correia da Silva

title: (2495) Fátima - Parque do Santuário
description: Nice parking spot. Just behind the sanctuary of Fátima. Very quiet place. No noise. High security.

title: (2480-032) Alvados - 407 Rua Val do Bispo
description: A small place in the village with toilet and shower (cold) and drinking water. Too tight for large CC, only for smaller vehicles

title: (3105) Leiria - 18 Avenida Nossa Senhora da Guia
title_short: (3105) Leiria - 18 Avenida Nossa Senhora da Guia
description: Local to wash and vacuum your Motorhome.

title: (2495-448) Fátima - 123 Avenida Beato Nuno
description: Self-service laundry.

title: (3105) Mata Mourisca - Rua do Lagar
description: Large parking lot with picnic tables and barbecues. Free in February. Probably crowded in spring and summer. Water available.
